amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary or the Federal Transit Administration to implement, administer, or enforce section 18.36(c)(2) of title 49, Code of Federal Regulations, for construction hiring purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary or the Federal transit Administration to implement, administer, or enforce section 18.36(c)(2) of title 49, Code of Federal Regulations, for construction hiring purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
